00021 /**
00022  * Implements the player, keys events for going left, right & falling
00023  * and contains his board.
00024  */

00026 
00027   /**
00028    * X Position
00029    */

00033    * Angle
00034    */

00039    * Angle required (for changing)
00040    */

00044    * Current position (in cols)

00060    */
